committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of October 7 through October 13, 1979, as "National Stamp Collecting Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of October 7 through October 13, 1979, as "National Stamp Collecting Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of October 7 through October 13, 1979, as "National Stamp Collecting Week".
